metadata.title: Pre-Pull Common Docker Images on Worker Init

story.iWant: workers to pre-pull common images during initialization
story.soThat: first execution has minimal cold-start latency

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Given** worker node initializes 2. When** cloud-init script runs 3. Then** runner pre-pulls these images: 4. python:3.11-slim 5. python:3.10-slim 6. Custom datascience image 7. Custom ffmpeg image
